prayer.original_qbody: The United States Supreme Court has ruled that no state or local government may require the reading of the Lor's Prayer or Bible verses in public schools. What are your views on this - do you approve or disapprove of the court ruling?

jobfind.refined_qbody: About how easy would it be for you to find a job with another employer with approximately the same income and fringe benefits you now have?

spkath.original_qbody: There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against churches and religion... a. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your (city/town/community) against churches and religion, should he be allowed to speak, or not?
spkath.refined_qbody: There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against churches and religion... a. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your (city/town/community) against churches and religion, should he be allowed to speak, or not?

colath.original_qbody: There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against churches and religion... b. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?
colath.refined_qbody: There are always some people whose ideas are considered bad or dangerous by other people. For instance, somebody who is against churches and religion... Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?

spkrac.original_qbody: Or consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. a. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community claiming that Blacks are inferior, should he be allowed to speak, or not?
spkrac.refined_qbody: Consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. If such a person wanted to make a speech in your community claiming that Blacks are inferior, should he be allowed to speak, or not?

colrac.original_qbody: Or consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. b. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?
colrac.refined_qbody: Or consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. b. Should such a person be allowed to teach in a college or university, or not?

librac.original_qbody: Or consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. c. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote which said Blacks are inferior should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?
librac.refined_qbody: Consider a person who believes that Blacks are genetically inferior. If some people in your community suggested that a book he wrote which said Blacks are inferior should be taken out of your public library, would you favor removing this book, or not?

spkcom.original_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist: a. Suppose this admitted Communist wanted to make a speech in your community. Should he be allowed to speak, or not?
spkcom.refined_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose this admitted Communist wanted to make a speech in your community. Should he be allowed to speak, or not?

colcom.original_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist: b. Suppose he is teaching in a college. Should he be fired, or not?
colcom.refined_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose he is teaching in a college. Should he be fired, or not?

libcom.original_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist: c. Suppose he wrote a book which is in your public library. Somebody in your community suggests that the book should be removed from the library. Would you favor removing it, or not?
libcom.refined_qbody: Now, I should like to ask you some questions about a man who admits he is a Communist. Suppose he wrote a book which is in your public library. Somebody in your community suggests that the book should be removed from the library. Would you favor removing it, or not?

cappun.original_qbody: Do you favor or oppose the death enalty for persons convicted of murder?
cappun.refined_qbody: Do you favor or oppose the death enalty for persons convicted of murder?

polhitok.original_qbody: Are there any situations you can imagine in which you would approve of a policeman striking an adult male citizen?
polhitok.refined_qbody: Are there any situations you can imagine in which you would approve of a policeman striking an adult male citizen?

polabuse.original_qbody: If yes or not sure: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who: a. Had said vulgar and obscene things to the policeman?
polabuse.refined_qbody: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who had said vulgar and obscene things to the policeman?

polattak.original_qbody: If yes or not sure: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who: d. Was attacking the policeman with his fists?
polattak.refined_qbody: Would you approve of a policeman striking a citizen who was attacking the policeman with his fists?

grass.original_qbody: Do you think the use of marijuana should be made legal or not?
grass.refined_qbody: Do you think the use of marijuana should be made legal or not?

gunlaw.refined_qbody: Would you favor or oppose a law which would require a person to obtain a police permit before he or she could buy a gun?

satfin.original_qbody: We are interested in how people are getting along financially these days. So far as you and your family are concerned, would you say that you are pretty well satisfied with your present financial situation, more or less satisfied, or not satisfied at all?
satfin.refined_qbody: We are interested in how people are getting along financially these days. So far as you and your family are concerned, would you say that you are pretty well satisfied with your present financial situation, more or less satisfied, or not satisfied at all?

finalter.original_qbody: During the last few years, has your financial situation been getting better, worse, or has it stayed the same?
finalter.refined_qbody: During the last few years, has your financial situation been getting better, worse, or has it stayed the same?

finrela.original_qbody: Compared with American families in general, would you say your family income is far below average, below average, average, above average, or far above average?
finrela.refined_qbody: Compared with American families in general, would you say your family income is far below average, below average, average, above average, or far above average?

racdif1.original_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are: a. Mainly due to discrimination?
racdif1.refined_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are mainly due to discrimination?

racdif2.original_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are: b. Because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have less in-born ability to learn?
racdif2.refined_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have less in-born ability to learn?

racdif3.original_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are: c. Because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) don't have the chance for education that it takes to rise out of poverty?
racdif3.refined_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) don't have the chance for education that it takes to rise out of poverty?

racdif4.original_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are: d. Because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) just don't have the motivation or willpower to pull themselves up out of poverty?
racdif4.refined_qbody: On the average (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) have worse jobs, income, and housing than white people. Do you think these differences are because most (negroes/blacks/African-Americans) just don't have the motivation or willpower to pull themselves up out of poverty?

wlthwhts.original_qbody: Now I have some questions about different groups in our society. I'm going to show you a seven-point scale on which the characteristics of people in a group can be rated. A score of 1 means that you think almost all of the people in that group are "rich." A score of 7 means that you think almost everyone in the group are "poor." A score of 4 means you think that the group is not towards one end or another, and of course you may choose any number in between that comes closest to where you think people in that group stand. 1. Whites
wlthwhts.refined_qbody: Now I have some questions about different groups in our society. I'm going to show you a seven-point scale on which the characteristics of people in a group can be rated. A score of 1 means that you think almost all of the people in that group are "rich." A score of 7 means that you think almost everyone in the group are "poor." A score of 4 means you think that the group is not towards one end or another, and of course you may choose any number in between that comes closest to where you think people in that group stand. Group: Whites

wlthblks.original_qbody: Now I have some questions about different groups in our society. I'm going to show you a seven-point scale on which the characteristics of people in a group can be rated. A score of 1 means that you think almost all of the people in that group are "rich." A score of 7 means that you think almost everyone in the group are "poor." A score of 4 means you think that the group is not towards one end or another, and of course you may choose any number in between that comes closest to where you think people in that group stand. 3. Blacks

A score of 1 means that you think almost all of the people in that group are "rich." A score of 7 means that you think almost everyone in the group are "poor." A score of 4 means you think that the group is not towards one end or another, and of course you may choose any number in between that comes closest to where you think people in that group stand. A score of 4 means you think that the group is not towards one end or another, and of course you may choose any number in between that comes closest to where you think people in that group stand. 5. Hispanic Americans

racwork.original_qbody: Are the people who work where you work all white, mostly white, about half and half, mostly black, or all black?
racwork.refined_qbody: Are the people who work where you work all white, mostly white, about half and half, mostly black, or all black?

letin1a.original_qbody: Do you think the number of immigrants to America nowadays should be...
letin1a.refined_qbody: Do you think the number of immigrants to America nowadays should be...
option_list: Remain the same as it is

getahead.original_qbody: Some people say that people get ahead by their own hard work; others say that lucky breaks or help from other people are more important. Which do you think is most important?
getahead.refined_qbody: Some people say that people get ahead by their own hard work; others say that lucky breaks or help from other people are more important. Which do you think is most important?

aged.original_qbody: As you know, many older people share a home with their grown children. Do you think this is generally a good idea or a bad idea?
aged.refined_qbody: As you know, many older people share a home with their grown children. Do you think this is generally a good idea or a bad idea?

parsol.original_qbody: Compared to your parents when they were the age you are now, do you think your own standard of living now is much better, somewhat better, about the same, somewhat worse, or much worse than theirs was?
parsol.refined_qbody: Compared to your parents when they were the age you are now, do you think your own standard of living now is much better, somewhat better, about the same, somewhat worse, or much worse than theirs was?

kidssol.original_qbody: When your children are at the age you are now, do you think their standard of living will be much better, somewhat better, about the same, somewhat worse, or much worse that your is now?
kidssol.refined_qbody: When your children are at the age you are now, do you think their standard of living will be much better, somewhat better, about the same, somewhat worse, or much worse that your is now?

spanking.original_qbody: Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good, hard, spanking?
spanking.refined_qbody: Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree that it is sometimes necessary to discipline a child with a good, hard, spanking?

divlaw.original_qbody: Should divorce in this country be easier or more difficult to obtain than it is now?
divlaw.refined_qbody: Should divorce in this country be easier or more difficult to obtain than it is now?

sexeduc.original_qbody: Would you be for or against sex education in the public schools?
sexeduc.refined_qbody: Would you be for or against sex education in the public schools?

pillok.original_qbody: Do you strongly agree, agree, or strongly disagree that methods of birth control should be available to teenagers between the ages of 14 and 16 if their parents do not approve?
pillok.refined_qbody: Do you strongly agree, agree, or strongly disagree that methods of birth control should be available to teenagers between the ages of 14 and 16 if their parents do not approve?

xmarsex.original_qbody: What is yoru opinion about a married person having sexual relations with someone other than the marriage partner?
xmarsex.refined_qbody: What is yoru opinion about a married person having sexual relations with someone other than the marriage partner?

homosex.original_qbody: What about sexual relations between two adults of the same sex?
homosex.refined_qbody: What about sexual relations between two adults of the same sex?

marhomo.original_qbody: Do you agree or disagree? j. Homosexual couples should have the right to marry one another.
marhomo.refined_qbody: Do you agree or disagree? Homosexual couples should have the right to marry one another.

discaff.original_qbody: What do you think the chances are these days that a white person won't get a job or promotion while an equally or less qualified black person gets one instead?
discaff.refined_qbody: What do you think the chances are these days that a white person won't get a job or promotion while an equally or less qualified black person gets one instead?

abdefect.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: a. There is a strong chance of serious defect in the baby?
abdefect.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if there is a strong chance of serious defect in the baby?

abnomore.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: b. She is married and does not want any more children?
abnomore.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if she is married and does not want any more children?

abhlth.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: c. The woman's own health is seriously endangered by the pregnancy?
abhlth.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if the woman's own health is seriously endangered by the pregnancy?

abpoor.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: d. The family has a very low income and cannot afford any more children?
abpoor.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if the family has a very low income and cannot afford any more children?

abrape.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: e. She became pregnant as a result of rape?
abrape.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if she became pregnant as a result of rape?

absingle.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: f. She is not married and does not want to marry the man?
absingle.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if she is not married and does not want to marry the man?

abany.original_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if: g. The woman wants it for any reason?
abany.refined_qbody: Please tell me whether or not you think it should be possible for a pregnant woman to obtaina legal abortion if the woman wants it for any reason?

letdie1.original_qbody: When a person has a disease that cannot be cured, do you think doctors should be allowed by law to end the patient's life by some painless means if the patient and his family request it?
letdie1.refined_qbody: When a person has a disease that cannot be cured, do you think doctors should be allowed by law to end the patient's life by some painless means if the patient and his family request it?

suicide1.original_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person: a. Has an incurable disease?
suicide1.refined_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has an incurable disease?

suicide2.original_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person: b. Has gone bankrupt?
suicide2.refined_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has gone bankrupt?

suicide3.original_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person: c. Has dishonored his or her family?
suicide3.refined_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person has dishonored his or her family?

suicide4.original_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person: d. Is tired of living and ready to die?
suicide4.refined_qbody: Do you think a person has the right to end his or her own life if this person is tired of living and ready to die?

pornlaw.original_qbody: Which of these statements comes closest to your feelings about pornography laws: 1. There should be laws against the distribution of pornography whatever the age. 2. There should be laws against the distribution of pornography to persons under 18. 3. There should be no laws forbidding the distribution of pornography.
pornlaw.refined_qbody: Which of these statements comes closest to your feelings about pornography laws?
option_list: There should be laws against the distribution of pornography whatever the age
There should be laws against the distribution of pornography to persons under 18
There should be no laws forbidding the distribution of pornography

fair.original_qbody: Do you think most people would try to take advantage of you if they got a chance, or would they try to be fair?
fair.refined_qbody: Do you think most people would try to take advantage of you if they got a chance, or would they try to be fair?

helpful.original_qbody: Would you say that most of the time people try to be helpful, or that they are mostly just looking out for themselves?
helpful.refined_qbody: Would you say that most of the time people try to be helpful, or that they are mostly just looking out for themselves?

trust.original_qbody: Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in life?
trust.refined_qbody: Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people?

tax.original_qbody: Do you consider the amount of federal income tax which you have to pay as too high, about right, or too low?
tax.refined_qbody: Do you consider the amount of federal income tax which you have to pay as too high, about right, or too low?

vote16.original_qbody: In 2016, you remember that Clinton ran for President on the Democratic ticket against Trump for the Republicans. Do you remember for sure whether or not you voted in that election?
vote16.refined_qbody: In 2016, you remember that Clinton ran for President on the Democratic ticket against Trump for the Republicans. Do you remember for sure whether or not you voted in that election?

pres16.original_qbody: Did you vote for Clinton or Trump
pres16.refined_qbody: Did you vote for Clinton or Trump?

if16who.original_qbody: Who would you have voted for, for president, if you had voted?
if16who.refined_qbody: Who would you have voted for, for president, if you had voted?

news.original_qbody: How often do you read the newspaper - every day, a few times a week, once a week, less than once a week, or never?
news.refined_qbody: How often do you read the newspaper - every day, a few times a week, once a week, less than once a week, or never?

attend.original_qbody: How often do you attend religious services?
attend.refined_qbody: How often do you attend religious services?
option_list: About once or twice a year

pray.original_qbody: About how often do you pray?
pray.refined_qbody: About how often do you pray?

postlife.original_qbody: Do you believe there is a life after death?
postlife.refined_qbody: Do you believe there is a life after death?

bible.original_qbody: Which of these statements comes closest to describing your feelings about teh Bible? 1. The Bible is the actual word of God and is to be taken literally, word for word. 2. The Bible is the inspired word of God but not everything in it should be taken literally, word for word. 3. The Bible is an ancient book of fables, legends, history, and moral precepts recorded by men.
bible.refined_qbody: Which of these statements comes closest to describing your feelings about the Bible? 1. The Bible is the actual word of God and is to be taken literally, word for word. 2. The Bible is the inspired word of God but not everything in it should be taken literally, word for word. 3. The Bible is an ancient book of fables, legends, history, and moral precepts recorded by men.

reborn.original_qbody: Would you say you have been "born again" or have had a "born again" experience - that is, a turning point in your life when you committed yourself to Christ?
reborn.refined_qbody: Would you say you have been "born again" or have had a "born again" experience - that is, a turning point in your life when you committed yourself to Christ?

savesoul.original_qbody: Have you ever tried to encourage someone to believe in Jesus Christ or to accep Jesus Christ as his or her savior?
savesoul.refined_qbody: Have you ever tried to encourage someone to believe in Jesus Christ or to accept Jesus Christ as his or her savior?

relpersn.original_qbody: To what extent do you consider yourself a religious person? Are you . . .
relpersn.refined_qbody: To what extent do you consider yourself a religious person?

sprtprsn.original_qbody: To what extent do you consider yourself a spiritual person? Are you . . .
sprtprsn.refined_qbody: To what extent do you consider yourself a spiritual person?

born.original_qbody: Were you born in this country?
born.refined_qbody: Were you born in this country?

granborn.original_qbody: Were all of your four grandparents born in this country? a. How many were born outside the United States?
granborn.refined_qbody: Were all of your four grandparents born in this country? How many were born outside the United States?

dwelown.refined_qbody: (Do you/Does your family) own your (home/apartment), pay rent, or what?

othlang.original_qbody: Can you speak a language other than English?
othlang.refined_qbody: Can you speak a language other than English?

health.original_qbody: Would you say your own health, in general, is excellent, good, fair, or poor?
health.refined_qbody: Would you say your own health, in general, is excellent, good, fair, or poor?

webmob.original_qbody: Do you have access to the Internet or World Wide Web in your home through a Internet-enabled mobile device like a smart phone, PDA, or BlackBerry?
webmob.refined_qbody: Do you have access to the Internet or World Wide Web in your home through a Internet-enabled mobile device like a smart phone, PDA, or BlackBerry?

xmovie.original_qbody: Have you seen an x-rated movie in the last year?
xmovie.refined_qbody: Have you seen an x-rated movie in the last year?

life.original_qbody: In general, do you find life exciting, pretty routine, or dull?
life.refined_qbody: In general, do you find life exciting, pretty routine, or dull?

richwork.original_qbody: If you were to get enough money to live as comfortably as you would like for the rest of your life, would you continue to work or would you stop working?
richwork.refined_qbody: If you were to get enough money to live as comfortably as you would like for the rest of your life, would you continue to work or would you stop working?
